definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shine, sparkle (NH [[נִחְנֵץ]]; akin to Ar. na0d.a sparkle, flash, Targum [[נְעָא]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[וְנׁחְחִים כְּעֵין נְחשֶׁת]] Ez Eze 1:7 (of cherubim);—Perles:Anal.45 prop. [[נוֹחִיחָם]] their plumage (´[[נ]] ‖ form of [[נוֹחָה]]), cf. Ew.
